phrs.translation: 类脂物代谢作用；类脂化合物代谢作用
需氧代谢；有氧新陈代谢

sentences.sentence: When they detect an extended dry period, they divert their metabolisms, producing sugars and certain stress-associated proteins and other materials in their tissues.
sentences.translation: 当它们发现干旱期延长时，它们会改变自己的新陈代谢，在它们的组织中产生糖和某些与应激相关的蛋白质和其他物质。

sentences.sentence: Short sleepers also tend to be thin and have faster metabolisms.
sentences.translation: 短睡眠者通常会很瘦并且新陈代谢很快。

sentences.sentence: Small animals have faster metabolisms, so it was thought they would wear out more quickly.
sentences.translation: 小动物新陈代谢的速度更快，所以衰老的更快。
